description.text: Small forts for protecting a Base or royalty. One Base.

ru.original: Small forts for protecting a Base or royalty. One Base.
ru.translation: Небольшие форты для защиты базы или знати. Одна база.

es.original: Small forts for protecting a Base or royalty. One Base.
es.translation:
Un pequeño fortín protege cada núcleo.
Un núcleo.

de.original: Small forts for protecting a Base or royalty. One Base.
de.translation: Kleine Festungen zum Schutz einer Basis oder königlichen Hoheit. Eine Basis.

fr.original: Small forts for protecting a Base or royalty. One Base.
fr.translation: De petites forteresses idéales pour protéger votre base ou la princesse ! Une base.

pt.original: Small forts for protecting a Base or royalty. One Base.
pt.translation: Pequenos fortes para proteger uma Base ou a realeza. Uma Base.
